module.name: Call Waiting
module.changelog: *2.5.0.1* localization updates *2.5.0* localization string enclosures *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.1.2.2* changed categories *1.1.2.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.2* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.1.1* Fixed typo Provdes to Provides* *1.1* First release for 2.2
module.description: Provides an option to turn on/off call waiting
